DOC.brief_title: A Phase 2 Study Pertuzumab Erlotinib Refractory Pancreatic Adenocarcinoma
DOC.detailed_description: A single-institution , single-arm phase 2 study investigate pertuzumab erlotinib palliative regimen treatment locally-advanced metastatic pancreatic adenocarcinoma .
